intakeQuestions.question: How long will you be working in Belgium?
Do you have a valid work contract issued by your employer?
options: Yes, I have a valid work contract
No, I don't have a work contract

intakeQuestions.question: Do you have health insurance coverage for the duration of your stay in Belgium?
options: No, I don't have health insurance

intakeQuestions.question: Do you have a bank account in Belgium to receive your wages?
options: Yes, I have a Belgian bank account
No, I don't have a Belgian bank account

intakeQuestions.question: How many parents do you have?
